welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Nowa Deba, a charming city known for its rich history and natural beauty. Get ready to be enchanted by our quaint streets, delicious cuisine, and warm hospitality. Enjoy your stay and explore all that our wonderful city has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Mielec Airport offers domestic and international flights to various destinations.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Mielec Airport handles freight and cargo operations for both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Jasionka Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for charter flights and low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
